mentionedBy.name: Unity Software Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Primary competitor. Leads in visual fidelity with Nanite and Lumen systems for film-grade real-time rendering. Dominates graphically rich game development. Massive ecosystem with abundant learning materials and Marketplace assets. Free with 5% royalty on revenues exceeding $1M. Full source code access. Unity and Unreal are the two dominant platforms driving game development innovation.
